channel.title: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?

item.title: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Before I got rid of my account (needed cash bad :(), I botted about 10 hours a day, for about a month. So, around 300-310 hours still without banned?

Read full topic
item.source: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?

item.title: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

jmood128:

What bot do you use, because I am not sure if this is possible since almost no bot supports foreign servers…

RSBot does, it runs on mouse locations not language. the foreign servers run on the exact same english java, its just that everything visual is translated. it doesn’t change anything.
I use RSBot, and created a few of my own scripts. Or, atleast, i find scripts for like, woodcutting, and translate the names of everything into the language i have it set to (german).
Works well, try it.

Read full topic

item.title: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

eyeownyew:

200+ hours. Go on a foreign server, and program a script to say random foreign words. The mods never get what you’re saying anyway.

What bot do you use, because I am not sure if this is possible since almost no bot supports foreign servers…

item.title: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:39, topic:363482”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=459729.msg3373541#msg3373541 date=1287427943]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=459729.msg3373510#msg3373510 date=1287426589]

Recently just botted 99 woodcutting, hurrah for me!
[/quote]How long did it take you?

From 92 it took quite awhile, maybe 2 weeks of straight botting.

92-99 willows with epic woodcutter.
[/quote]Are you not a member? Why didn’t you do ivy?[/quote]

Because Willows are deserted now because IvyBots have taken over.

item.source: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?

item.title: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @i_have_an_ax i have an ax
item.description:
@i_have_an_ax wrote:

[quote=“Synchrodark, post:55, topic:363482”]lol how do you bot in real life? And I think I know why I got banned, but i am unsure since it’s not really considered a bot, is autoclicking not allowed? cause I did magic that way. and mabey that was it. Who knows. My ban is been long lifted and I never cheated since then staying clean makes you feel more proud about your account’s stats.

FYI feel free add me anyone who wants to. My Moparscape Forums username = rs name[/quote]

Autoclicking is botting. Botting means the bot does the clicking for you. Autoclicking is where the bot is clicking for you.

Read full topic
item.source: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?

item.title: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @Synchrodark Synchrodark
item.description:

lol how do you bot in real life? And I think I know why I got banned, but i am unsure since it’s not really considered a bot, is autoclicking not allowed? cause I did magic that way. and mabey that was it. Who knows. My ban is been long lifted and I never cheated since then staying clean makes you feel more proud about your account’s stats.

FYI feel free add me anyone who wants to. My Moparscape Forums username = rs name

item.title: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @Synchrodark Synchrodark
item.description:
@Synchrodark wrote:

Well Then I got no idea what I was reported for because I had never botted. Ever… unless someone got on my account and botted for me… so please do explain how i got a ban for botting , while i never botted. I can even show you the offense in my history…

Read full topic
item.source: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?

item.title: Longest time you've botted without getting banned?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Synchrodark:

I didn’t even bot ever, but once I was on for like 36 hours straight. They thought I was botting, so I got a temp ban… Other then that i’ve never been banned for botting, been banned once for scamming. But i been playing clean since 2006.

Lies, Jagex’s bot detecting system doesn’t work like that…

Read full topic
